original_text: Some time after his brothers had gone, Jesus also went to the festival. But he did not let other people know that he was going. Instead, he went secretly.
korean_text: 그 형제들이 명절에 올라간 후에 자기도 올라가시되 나타내지 않고 은밀히 가시니라

sentences.original_text: Some time after his brothers had gone,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 형제들이 떠난 지 얼마 지나서,

sentences.original_text: Jesus also went to the festival.
But he did not let other people know
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 다른 사람들이 알지 못하게 하셨습니다
